title: The Bad Boy Dom
description: After a hard life of rock-n-roll, drugs, and women took him down the wrong path, Krispin Righteous, the lead singer of Blood Rights is ready to re-enter the world of BDSM.Angela has searched for the perfect Dom her entire life. Maybe imperfect is more of what she needs.Sex, rock-n-roll, and love. A much better combination!
author: Holly S. Roberts
